column2: #now all the same graphs but only for the obamatrump time period
geom_bar(aes(x = recDate, y = -durApproxInUSD/1000, fill = factor(yearsCat,c("less than a year", "1-2 years", "2-4 years", "4-8 years", "8-12 years", "12-20 years", "20+ years"))),
ggtitle("$B change in Market Value of all Outstanding Treasuries
for a .01% Decrease in Interest Rates - Obama-Trump Years
geom_bar(aes(x = recDate, y = durApproxInUSD/sumDur, fill = factor(yearsCat, c("less than a year", "1-2 years", "2-4 years", "4-8 years", "8-12 years", "12-20 years", "20+ years"))),
ggtitle("% of Total Change in Market Value of all Outstanding Treasuries
for a .01% Decrease in Interest Rates
yearsCat,c("less than a year", "1-2 years", "2-4 years", "4-8 years", "8-12 years", "12-20 years", "20+ years"))),

ggtitle("Outstanding Treasuries as a % of Total Outstanding Treasuries
